title: Joseph Reveals His Identity
summary: Genesis 45 is the emotional climax where Joseph reveals his identity to his brothers. He assures them that God used their actions for good and invites them to bring their father and families to Egypt.

faq.question: How did the brothers react to Joseph’s reveal?
faq.answer: They were shocked and speechless at first, but later embraced him with joy.

faq.question: What was Joseph’s perspective on his suffering?
faq.answer: He believed God used it to preserve life and save their family during the famine.
